name: Ash Zombie
desc: These zombies were created by the magical devastation when Mount Hotenow erupted thirty years ago.
languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

special_abilities.name: Ash Puff
special_abilities.desc: The first time the zombie takes damage, any living creature within 5 feet of the zombie must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or gain Disadvantage on attack rolls, saving throws and ability checks for one minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on it early with a successful save.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
